name: Fashion Business
description:
This Game Is About Monica...

And Monica Is a "rich B***h".

What’s More - Monica Is a BOSS.

Most of all Monica adores authority and to control people, and she manages everything in a not so sensitive or delicate way.
If Monica was your Boss, you would likely be fired :)
Everybody has met their own Monica before, that's for certain!

Take part in her luxurious life. Monica is sure that her existence is going to be always the same! What do you think? If suddenly you appear as a witness of her falling down lower and lower in the social standing? If she would have to meet those people whom she had offended?

Find Out Her Destiny!

If you get to know Monica, she will drive you mad. You are going to have an opportunity to hate her, but it’s impossible to be indifferent.

4300 images and 225 animation clips await you in the first episode of the Game.
